Uses of Class
io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.event.Event

  • Packages that use Event 
    Package Description
    io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.event  

    • Uses of Event in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.event

      Subclasses of Event in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.event 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EffectsEvent
      Listens for changes to either the effect currently being displayed, or changes to the effects installed on the Nanoleaf device.
      class  LayoutEvent
      Listens for changes to the physical layout of the Nanoleaf panels.
      class  StateEvent
      Listens for changes to the state of the Nanoleaf device, such as changes in brightness.
      class  TouchEvent
      Listens for physical interactions with the Nanoleaf panels, such as single/double taps and swipes.
      Methods in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.event that return Event 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Event Event.fromJSON(EventType type, org.json.JSONObject json)
      Creates an event from JSON.
      Methods in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.event with parameters of type Event 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void NanoleafEventListener.onEvent(Event[] events)
      Called when one or more events have been received.
